page.title: 19What People are Doing
page.content: In 1985 people are thinking about keeping fit and eating{health foods. A lot of people are on special diets. There are several{leisure centres around our D block.There is no sports centres in the D block although there are playing fields around.A lot of people do sports in their leisure time.{Swimming}is a sport that most people like to do.Herringthorpe,near Rotherham and Worksop Sports Centres both have swimming pools and sports facilities. A lot of people have got {hobbies}and people collect things like stamps and old bottles.Many adults collect beer mats,coins,thimbles and Antiques.
